comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
Club Troubadour only existed from August 14 to September l947. Before this it was Club 18, and after it became Club Be-Bop and again Club 18 and closed.
(“Music–As Written, Billboard, August 16, 1947, 36).
(“Cole Trio Is Booked In Meadowbrook After Troubadour Shutters,” Billboard, Nov 4, 1947, 23).
